reviews.text: A friend of mine taught in Japan for years and lives in Ohio again. She told me when she needs to connect with memories of Japan, she goes to Akai Hana...

Share an entree -! They're all big enough for at least two people. 

The food is very, very good. Seafood tasted fresh. I got the seafood Teriyaki and it...
First time dining here and loved it!  This cute little spot was so much nicer than I expected. It's in a part of town I don't frequent much so I didn't know...
